awd_titl_txt: I/UCRC for Tie Project with the University of California at Berkeley for a Substructure Method for Dynamic Simulation ofMicromechanical Systems with Geometric Nonlinearities
awd_abstract_narration: This is a "Tie" project between the University of Iowa and the             University of California at Berkeley.  The Berkeley I/UCRC for                  Sensors and Actuators is fabricating micromechanical devices for                precision instrument applications with structural nonlinear                     behavior.  To support analysis of micromechanical instruments, it               is important to develop a numerically efficient structure dynamic               response simulation capability that accounts for geometric                      nonlinearity.  The I/UCRC for Simulation Center for Mechanical                  System at the University of Iowa has established very strong                    research base in simulation software for dynamics of mechanical                 systems.                                                                             This project meets the requirements of NSF I/UCRC Program                  "Tie" project award.  The Program Director recommends the                       University of Iowa be awarded $50,000 for a two year "Tie" project
org_div_long_name: Division of Engineering Education and Centers
